LICENSES & CERTIFICATION.Name: Developing Microsoft Azure and Web Services
MICROSOFT CERTIFIED SOLUTIONS DEVELOPER - Web Applications
* MICROSOFT CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPER- Windows Developer 4.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
This is a huge and complex project for a fortune 500 logistic company. The project comprises of various modules including Customer, Resource Center, Product, Equipment, Driver, Tour, Admin and other auxiliary modules. The multi layered test driven development (TDD) project that includes User Interface as separate layer developed in WPF/XAML using MVVM and Prism 4.0 design pattern. The Business Logic, Business Entities, Data Access Layer and other common layers has been developed as separate layers. To communicate with UI and business layers, we have developed WCF service that has been accessed via Proxy at UI side. The key technologies we have used and implemented are C#, SOA, WCF services, LINQ, WPF/XAML, IoC and dependency injection, WinForm in multithreaded fashion.

Responsibilities:
	Involvement with Architect and designers to design Customer module.
	Involvements in developing use cases and use case diagram.
	Co-ordination with team members in development of system as per Use cases and business rules as WCF service.
	Involvement in designing and development of UI using WPF/XAML by using Model-View-View Model (MVVM) pattern.
	Involvement in making the modules less coupling using IoC and dependency Injection. We have used here Unity Container for this purpose.
	Involvement in designing, development and Implementation of business layers separated by Business entities, business processor, Data Access repository, Common library and other infrastructure related layers. 
	Development and implementation of WCF Service and underlying data contract, service contract, message contract using C# as language.
	Development of stored procedure/views.
	Development of client to test the service.
	Development of Mock objects, Test Class and Test Methods using Visual studio test framework and unit test verification.
	Defects assignment to members and ensuring to meet deadlines.
	Code review to ensure meeting the coding guidelines.
